summary: This is basically a modders resource specially designed, for whoever wants to make a ranch or something similar, and wants to make it inmersive, ¡INTENDED TO BE A RESOURCE!
descriptionHtml:
Hello there Nexus, This is basically a modders resource for, as said in the description, everyone who is affitionated to making abodes-player homes, and wishes to make a ranch, this is a fully new built stable with place enough for 4 horses amd oviously extendable, but would suppouse a complete reformation of the own skeleton

I have situated it in dawnstar, anyways it's still intended to be a resource, so even thought I have worked hard to make it look as good as possible, this is pretty much my only publick mod, and my skills are still reaching the "begginer" tag, anyways:

You can use this as base to make your own stable, Skeleton to re-build, (i'll be doing that myself and posting it here for future resources), into another matherials, [font=Comic Sans MS][u]it does require hearthfire: [/u][/font]mostly because I have used in the decoration various hearthfire items, like for example the lighting of the own stable, cause it DOES have it's own lighting

Also everything here is built up piece by piece, therefore, it is possible to find little mistakes, like a mismatching light and all, but geez, we all know here what's it like to rotate things in creation kit and similar,

PERMISIONS:
[list][*]You can use this freely, as long as you give credit since the full base of the stable was created by myself, [/*]
[*]You can do whatever as long as you give credit and link to the original resource[/*]
[*]You don't need to ask for permission, however it would be great to see it in your own work so if you can please send me a pm! or leave your work in my file's post tag [/*]
[/list][u]
Recomended:[/u]
Inmersive stables
Serana and family (appearing in my images)
Swift Steed Stables (My arab horse showing on the box 1)
author: JockrisLatour
